title._content: [Unidentified woman wearing mourning brooch and displaying framed image of unidentifed soldier] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified woman wearing mourning brooch and displaying framed image of unidentifed soldier] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 12.5 x 11.2 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Frame: Berg, no. 7-41. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Women--1860-1870. Soldiers--1860-1870. Photographs--1860-1870. Mourning clothing & dress--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27192 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2339
